name: Taskule Hotel

reviews.text: We have been going to the Taskule Hotel for several years now and it is a gem of a hotel - the rooms are absolutely gorgeous and spotlessly clean (thanks to Sultan who is a little star). nothing is too much trouble and they always treat us like family when we come to stay. its in a great location with a lovely bar/restaurant at the front of it which we like to eat in and watch the sunset.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel!!

likes.liked: — The gorgeous rooms and the friendly staff
likes.disliked: — there is nothing not to like its perfect!

reviews.title: a haven of tranquility
reviews.text: What a wonderful hotel! We stayed at the beginning of April and this was one of the few hotels in Yalikavak to have the swimming pool ready for use. Excellent, friendly service - nothing was too much trouble. Easy walking distance to village (2 mins if that!) and straight onto beach.

reviews.title: Hotel Taskule a treasure
reviews.text: Spotlessly clean, beautifully decorated rooms - can't wait to go back.

I stayed in this Hotel before it was refurbished, and saw the refurbishment taking place. The owners are charming people and the staff excellent. they have become firm friends. The standard of the Hotel is very high, always spotlessly clean. I would recommend this Hotel to anyone on their first trip to Turkey and Yalikavak it is a wonderful experience.
reviews.title: What a charming place!

reviews.text: We have just had a 7 night stay at the 'Excellent' Taskule hotel in Yalikavak.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel - One of the best in Yalikavak

reviews.text: The staff could not have been more frienly, and we will definatly look to stay here again on our next visit.
reviews.title: Wish we were there now!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As professionals from the airline industry we stay in fine hotels all over the world and expect a very high standard, this one is of a very high standard and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a high standard of comfort.
reviews.title: Location is all...

reviews.text: I especialy enjoyed sitting outiside the hotel on the sofas with a cool drink wantching the sun go down over the sea.
reviews.title: Nice location

reviews.text: Please ignore any of the negative reviews about the staff, this hotel is exceptionaly friendly and they could not do enough for myself my wife and my 2 year old Georgina.

description: Taskule Hotel is located on the beach. All rooms are air conditioned and with full facilities. A wireless internet connection is available in hotel. It is 50 meters away from city center, where you can find all kinds of activities.
